name: NitroSecurityNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Follow the latest news and breaking news for Security related issues from Nitro within Alexa’s Flash Briefing.

After enabling this skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing and hear reminders when monthly invoices are available to view. The Nitro Monthly Reminders feed will need to be "turned on" within the flash briefing settings to enable reminder feeds

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move Nitro Security News to the top of your news brief!
